1370: Baua was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
Got married to Wlfarde at age 22 in 1370.
Gave birth to Helyana in 1370 at age 22.
1371: Gave birth to Siburgis in 1371 at age 23.
1372: Gave birth to Douwen in 1372 at age 24.
1374: Lost daughter Douwen when Douwen was 3 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Lutghardis in 1375 at age 27.
1376: Gave birth to Moerseil in 1376 at age 28.
Lost daughter Lutghardis when Lutghardis was 2 years old.
1377: Gave birth to Mabelie in 1377 at age 29.
1379: Gave birth to Vais in 1379 at age 31.
1382: Gave birth to Falco in 1382 at age 34.
1385: Gave birth to Baua in 1385 at age 37.
1386: Gave birth to Segherarden in 1386 at age 38.
Lost daughter Siburgis when Siburgis was 16 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
